headline: Interior Dept. Halts Drones Over Worries About China
abstract: The order formalizes a decision last year to ground the federal agency’s drones pending an internal security investigation.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The Interior Department announced on Wednesday that it was grounding its entire fleet of drones out of concerns that Chinese parts in them might be used for spying, making exceptions only for emergency missions like fighting wildfires and search-and-rescue operations.
